title: My RP was 1,862 and i bought a 440 champ and my RP became 982?
body: I bought a Champion (Victor) it was on sale and its about 440 RP after I purchased that champ my RP became 982? like wth, u feel me? So i just want to know how to fix this problem?

replies.body: This should be a visual glitch in this case. It's a legacy issue that we're aware of. D:

1. This board is not tech support; nothing will come from posting like it is.
This board is for submitting formal reports of bug you have documented; only post for this purpose.

2.  The League Air client is well know for being a buggy pile that should have been replaced **years **ago but Riot has neglected to do so.  One of the issues is that it can't always do math.  Just restart the client.
While it's not tech support, it's still a bug and worth reporting if you aren't familiar with the glitch. ^-^

I get that.  I get that it doesn't hurt to report known bugs.

"So i just want to know how to fix this problem?"  The guy was only looking for help to adjust his RP balance, and this board can't do that, so it would be better to contact support or use Help & Support, the board directly above this one.
  He just posted this on _Report A Bug_ where threads don't even get a single reply most of the time and there is no sign that this board is even looked at by anyone at Riot... well, except for you.

i always find when i get IP/ RP glitches, go to the shop and try to buy another skin, when given the final purchase option it will show your actual RP balance, my client has given me -RP before. also relog can fix the issue. if it is an actual issue of it being inproperly reduced just send a ticket in supports general direction
